title: Why can't I get online?
content: Ever since I updated my Google pixel a few days ago, I now can't connect to the internet if I'm away from my home network. I've changed nothing, only did the recent update. I could be in a parking lot, waiting in the carpool line or driving on the interstate and want to do a Google search and could do that, but I've noticed that as soon as I leave my home there is no network connection, no internet. What happened?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
